snippet.title: ATELIER RORONA PLUS - OPENING INTRO
snippet.description:
"Like" us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/ateliergames
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/tecmokoeieurope

Official Site: http://www.ateliergames.eu/roronaplus

Release Date: 20 June 2014
Platform: PS3 & PS Vita
In-game Text: English
Voice Option: English + Japanese

Atelier Rorona Plus features a completely redone 3D character model for Rorona, but the improvements don't stop there as the game itself has been significantly enhanced: the item synthesis & crafting system has been redesigned for better playability, while there will be additional chapters and playable characters previously unavailable throughout the series.
